messages.content:
‘It’s the most important election of my generation. It’s the most important election in a generation.

We are choosing the kind of society we want our children and grandchildren to inherit.

For the many, not the few.’

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Labour will negotiate the best Brexit deal for the many, not the few. Leaving the EU with the objective of protecting our economy, jobs and public services.
Labour promises to build over a million new homes, with at least half for social rent.
Labour pledges to invest in our NHS, ensuring everyone can access the healthcare they need.
Labour pledges to bring free education to all, including higher education and adult learning.

issues.brexitEurope: Labour will negotiate the best Brexit deal for the many, not the few. Leaving the EU with the objective of protecting our economy, jobs and public services.
issues.economy: Labour will negotiate the best Brexit deal for the many, not the few. Leaving the EU with the objective of protecting our economy, jobs and public services.
issues.education: Labour pledges to bring free education to all, including higher education and adult learning.
issues.health: Labour pledges to invest in our NHS, ensuring everyone can access the healthcare they need.
issues.immigration: Ending freedom of movement and unlimited migration from the EU, and guaranteeing existing reciprocal rights for all EU nationals living in Britain and UK citizens living in EU countries.
issues.labourEmployment: Fighting for policies that protect workers' rights, our economy and environment, and support the interests of our rural communities – a Brexit deal that works for every community in Britain!
issues.socialWelfare: Labour promises to build over a million new homes, with at least half for social rent.

community.content: Labour promises to build over a million new homes, with at least half for social rent.

leaflet.personalStatement: ‘Acting in the national interest means pursuing outcomes that work for the many, not just big business and tax avoiders. As your MP, I will be committed to fighting for policies that protect workers' rights, our economy and environment, and support the interests of our rural communities – a Brexit deal that works for every community in Britain!’

contactInformation.address: Promoted by Peter Brooks on behalf of Chantal Lee, 10 Earp Ave, Newark, NG24 4DD

endorsements.endorsement: ‘I do have confidence that a Labour government will approach the Brexit negotiations in a positive and productive way. Labour's policies on rural affairs are very sensible and achievable.’

examples: Labour promises to build over a million new homes, with at least half for social rent.
Labour will negotiate the best Brexit deal for the many, not the few.
Leaving the EU with the objective of protecting our economy, jobs and public services.
Acting in the national interest means pursuing outcomes that work for the many, not just big business and tax avoiders.
Fighting for policies that protect workers' rights, our economy and environment, and support the interests of our rural communities – a Brexit deal that works for every community in Britain!
We are choosing the kind of society we want our children and grandchildren to inherit.
support the interests of our rural communities – a Brexit deal that works for every community in Britain!
Labour will negotiate the best Brexit deal for the many, not the few.
Labour promises to build over a million new homes, with at least half for social rent.
Labour pledges to bring free education to all, including higher education and adult learning.

‘I do have confidence that a Labour government will approach the Brexit negotiations in a positive and productive way. Labour's policies on rural affairs are very sensible and achievable.’ - Local farmer
Theresa May has already set an aggressive, rigid tone to forthcoming Brexit negotiations but, as NFU President Meurig Raymond said, ‘Brexit is not about burning bridges, but building them.’
